headline.main: U.S. Attorney: Chattanooga shooting "being treated as an act of terrorism"
headline.sub: U.S. Attorney: Chattanooga shooting "being treated as an act of terrorism"

docs.snippet: U.S. District Attorney William Killian says the Chattanooga shooting that left four Marines dead will be investigated as "an act of terrorism, until the proof shows us otherwise." Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. District Attorney William Killian says the Chattanooga shooting that left four Marines dead will be investigated as "an act of terrorism, until the proof shows us otherwise." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Congo Forum Opens Door to President's Re-election, Critics Cry Foul
headline.print_headline: Congo Forum Opens Door to President's Re-election, Critics Cry Foul

docs.snippet: A mass meeting of politicians, academics and other figures proposed changes to the Republic of Congo's constitution on Friday which could pave the way for their veteran leader to stay in power, a move decried by the opposition....
docs.lead_paragraph: A mass meeting of politicians, academics and other figures proposed changes to the Republic of Congo's constitution on Friday which could pave the way for their veteran leader to stay in power, a move decried by the opposition.

headline.main: FBI investigating "how and why this horrible act happened"
headline.sub: FBI investigating "how and why this horrible act happened"

docs.snippet: FBI Special Agent Ed Reinhold says the Chattanooga shooter traveled outside the U.S., but that it's premature to speculate his motive. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: FBI Special Agent Ed Reinhold says the Chattanooga shooter traveled outside the U.S., but that it's premature to speculate his motive. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: U.S. sports exec in plea talks in FIFA corruption case

headline.main: Pro-Israel Lobby Backs Group to Fight Iranian Nuclear Deal
headline.print_headline: Pro-Israel Lobby Backs Group to Fight Iranian Nuclear Deal

docs.snippet: A powerful pro-Israel lobby is backing a new political group that on Friday launched a multimillion-dollar campaign to oppose the nuclear pact the United States recently made with Iran....
docs.lead_paragraph: A powerful pro-Israel lobby is backing a new political group that on Friday launched a multimillion-dollar campaign to oppose the nuclear pact the United States recently made with Iran.

headline.main: Pro-Israel Aipac Creates Group to Lobby Against the Iran Deal
headline.print_headline: Pro-Israel Group Creates Plan to Lobby Against Iran Deal

docs.snippet: The American Israel Public Affairs Committee has formed a tax-exempt lobbying group with the sole mission of educating the public “about the dangers of the proposed Iran deal.”...
docs.abstract: The American Israel Public Affairs Committee has formed a tax-exempt lobbying group with the sole mission of educating the public “about the dangers of the proposed Iran deal.”
